metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21899 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A code execution vulnerability exists in the dwgCompressor::copyCompBytes21 functionality of LibreCad libdxfrw 2.2.0-rc2-19-ge02f3580. A specially-crafted .dwg file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-21899` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

librecad - 2.1.3-1.2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
librecad-data - 2.1.3-1.2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: librecad package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.3-1.2+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
